definition: to receive/to accept/to enjoy/to bring into/to pay (tax etc)/nano- (one billionth)/to reinforce sole of shoes or stockings by close sewing

sentences.english: The slides show taxes paying form of tax system of Republic of Uzbekistan.
sentences.chinese: 幻燈片提供的是烏茲別克斯坦共和國稅務系統納稅表。

sentences.english: The customs may publish the failure of taxpayers to pay duty.
sentences.chinese: 海關可以對納稅義務人欠繳稅款的情況予以公告。

sentences.english: They paid their taxes, why can’t they get all their promised benefits?
sentences.chinese: 他們老實納稅，爲什麼不能得到許諾給他們的福利？

sentences.english: It’s not appropriate to leave queues of taxpayers and go for lunch.
sentences.chinese: 放下排長隊的納稅人去喫午飯這實在是不怎麼合適。

sentences.english: These tax forms are driving me nuts .
sentences.chinese: 填這些納稅申報表快讓我發瘋了。

sentences.english: The plan does, however, depend on American taxpayers stumping up huge amounts of money.
sentences.chinese: 但是，這項計劃需要依靠納稅人的錢來保證所需巨資。

sentences.english: Forget about throwing billions more of taxpayer money at Motown.
sentences.chinese: 別再打算拿幾十億納稅人血汗錢往汽車城打水漂了。

sentences.english: It is totally unfair but all my incomes are taxable at the top rate.
sentences.chinese: 我所有收入都要按最高比率納稅，這太不公平了。

sentences.english: Technical development cost can be deducted from the taxable income.
sentences.chinese: 技術開發費抵扣應納稅所得額。

sentences.english: In addition, streets adjacent to the taxpayer-subsidized complex will be closed.
sentences.chinese: 此外，由納稅者補助的聯合體附近的街道也將關閉。

sentences.english: Tourists slip goods through without paying taxes.
sentences.chinese: 旅遊者偷帶貨物過關不納稅。

sentences.english: We've filed a joint-income tax return.
sentences.chinese: 我們就共同的收入申報了納稅單。

sentences.english: Taxpayers are grumbling about the waste of government money,as usual.
sentences.chinese: 納稅人又像往常一樣抱怨政府浪費錢財。

sentences.english: Impartially enforcing the law and effectively safeguarding the legitimate rights and interests of taxpayers.
sentences.chinese: 秉公執法，切實維護納稅人的合法權益。

sentences.english: There will be no US taxpayer dollars used to prop-up GM's vast overseas network.
sentences.chinese: 美國納稅人不會用來支撐通用公司的巨大海外網絡。

sentences.english: Tax laws prohibit a partner from automatically inheriting anindividual retirement account without paying taxes.
sentences.chinese: 稅法禁止伴侶無需納稅，自動繼承個人退休收入。

definition: to report (to the authorities)/to declare (to customs)
personal income tax (abbr. for 個人所得稅|个人所得税)
